sense.def:
Luck
ali
good luck
je uspeh, ki ga nekdo ne doseže zaradi svojih lastnih sposobnosti ali truda.
Bad luck
je neuspeh ali slabe stvari, ki se nam dogajajo in jih nismo povzročili sami, niti jih niso povzročili drugi.

seg.quote: One spring we had a lot of bad luck.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu rečemo
bad luck
ali
hard luck
, izražamo sočutje, ker mu je šlo nekaj narobe.

seg.quote: Tough luck, Barrett. You played a great game.

sense.def:
Kadar nekomu rečemo
good luck
ali
best of luck
, izražamo upanje, da bo uspešen.

seg.quote: Good luck to you, my boy.
Best of luck with the exams.

sense.def:
To be in luck
pomeni biti srečen ob določeni priložnosti.

To try one's luck at something
pomeni poskusiti uspeti v nečem.

seg.quote: He came to England to try his luck at a musical career.
This one should work with a bit of luck.
With any luck they might forget all about it.
